about_the_game:
Kakurenbo Neko is an adorably relaxing game that sets you out on a mission to find a litter of mischievous cats hiding in the trees.



DOWSING ROD?
That's right, and this magical twig points its way too pretty kitties close by! So forget calling the fire department and start poking at the leaves to find those little feisty felines.



This cozy game isn't just about cats!
A few Chihuahuas have been caught up in all the excitement! Could they be the ones chasing the cats up into the trees?

FEATURES

  • Kitty Collector
    Rescue all 50 unique kittens cloaking themselves amongst the leaves.
  • Chihuahuas?
    Hidden randomly throughout the game are 15 cute little chi-chis to collect.
  • Levels
    The game has 90 levels designed to satisfy your need to play hide and seek.
  • Arcade Modes
    If you can't get enough of playing hide and seek with the kitty cats you'll love the extra modes crafted to keep the fun going.
  • Steam Deck
    The game is the perfect relaxation game built for the steam deck and your favourite game controller but works beautifully with a mouse and keyboard too.
